blog.name: asinglepale-r-ose
blog.title: Just Freakin’ Take My Hand
blog.description: Eli. They/them. A writeblr and fandom blog. I tag (almost) everything. I reblog writing inspiration and advice. My main fandoms are Steven Universe and Boku No Hero Academia. I tag spoilers up to 2 weeks after they’re aired. I always tag bnha manga spoilers as the chapter they’re from and/or #manga spoilers. No SU Crit. No TERFs/SWERFs.

blog.name: thatbookwontwriteitself
blog.title: The Procrastination Station
blog.description: Swimming in multi-fandom hell while I procrastinate writing my own. She/Her, though somedays it gets a bit fluid. Proudly Irish. Proudly Jewish. Proudly Christian. And if you're trying to use faith to excuse your bigoted, radicalized, extremist, hateful behavior, you need to keep my God's name the fuck outta your mouth.

summary:
More shitty party city versions of their own pro hero costumes halloween party AU: 
Ectoplasm sticks googly eyes on a black...
body:
More shitty party city versions of their own pro hero costumes halloween party AU:

Ectoplasm sticks googly eyes on a black morph suit and calls it a day.

Thirteen just goes as the stay puft marshmallow man.

Midnight gets one of those novelty grilling aprons with her own usual costume printed on it. Like one of these things:

Aizawa just wears a fuckin hot topic Eraserhead t-shirt that’s just a black tee with his scarf printed around the shoulders and collar and like. Fuckin jeans or something. Whatever. This is stupid. I’m only going because Hizashi called in the debt I owe him entirely just for this.

Snipes wears a party city Mcree costume.

summary: The previously released Boku No Hero Academia "tomonui" keychains are bringing back their popular plushes, part of their game...
caption:
The previously released Boku No Hero Academia “tomonui” keychains are bringing back their popular plushes, part of their game center exclusive line of plush! The fourth volume features Shigaraki, Toga, and Dabi of the League of Villains! Pre-order on Aitai☆Kuji today~

Release Date: April 2019
Pre-Order: Starting from $25 on Aitai☆Kuji

Hero Analysis Notes: Dark Shadow (Rampage)

A rampaging Dark Shadow can bring down heinous villains with a single blow. When it comes down to it, only light might be able to stop him.

summary:
Izuku: So you are Touya Todoroki, aren't you?
Dabi: *Gasp* I would never--How could I---? Honestly, how do I know that YOU are...
body:
Izuku: So you are Touya Todoroki, aren’t you?

Dabi: *Gasp* I would never–How could I—? Honestly, how do I know that YOU are not a Todoroki, huh?! Ever think about that? A Todoroki? Me? Ha!

title: Sneak Peek
body:
Chapter 25

He stood out by the car as Kirishima ran ahead, his hands were shaking but that was okay. He breathed in slow and deep as he hit call. Quickly, before he could hang up or throw the phone as hard as he fucking could he yanked it up to his ear.

“Kacchan?”

“Fucking Deku.”

Silence.

“E-everything-”

“I know you saw.”

“I did! You guys were always great friends, and you’ll make an awesome team. I’ve already thought of a couple different power moves you guys could-”

Fuck he hated that the idiot’s voice went all happy and excited for him. And that Deku had already come up with moves. And that he just assumed they would be a team like it was the natural thing to do just because they were a couple. Not all couples worked together. Uraraka and Deku didn’t. He hated everything about it. He sucked in another breath, looking up as Eijirou waved at him. Katsuki held up a finger.

One minute.

“De- Midoriya. I know we sort of made up in high school. But I’ve changed a lot since then and I never apologized for everything.” Fuck no. He watched as Eijirou approached, his heart rate skyrocketing. Please stay away. Let me do this on my own. “I’m sorry…”
